whatIsService.title: What Is Hair Loss Treatment?
whatIsService.content:
Hair loss can be devastating, affecting not just your appearance but your confidence and self-esteem. Whether you're experiencing gradual thinning, sudden hair fall, or pattern baldness, you're not alone and you don't have to accept it as inevitable.

At The Skin Firm, we understand that hair loss is deeply personal. Our comprehensive hair loss treatments address the root causes whether hormonal, genetic, nutritional, or stress-related to help you regain not just your hair, but your confidence.

Under the expert care of Dr. Karishma Singh, we offer advanced, evidence-based treatments that stimulate hair growth, strengthen existing hair, and prevent further loss.

signsSymptoms.title: Signs & Symptoms of Hair Loss
items: Gradual thinning on top of the head
Patches of scaling that spread over the scalp
Excessive hair fall during washing or brushing

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Hair Loss Treatment at The Skin Firm?
whyChooseUs.content:
Watching your hair fall out can feel like losing a part of yourself. We've seen how hair loss affects confidence, relationships, and daily life and we're here to help you reclaim all of it.

At The Skin Firm, our hair loss treatments go beyond quick fixes. We identify the underlying causes and create personalized treatment plans that deliver real, lasting results.

Under the expert guidance of Dr. Karishma Singh, trusted hair loss specialist in Pune, we combine advanced medical treatments with compassionate care to help you achieve the fuller, healthier hair you deserve.

faqs.title: FAQs on Hair Loss Treatment in Pune

questions.question: How soon will I see results from hair loss treatment?
questions.answer: Initial results may be visible within 2-3 months, with significant improvement typically seen after 4-6 months of consistent treatment. Hair growth is a gradual process that requires patience.

questions.question: Is PRP treatment safe for hair loss?
questions.answer: Yes, PRP is completely safe as it uses your own blood platelets. There are minimal side effects, and the treatment is FDA-approved for hair restoration.

questions.question: Can women undergo hair loss treatment?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Our treatments are effective for both men and women. We customize the approach based on the specific type and cause of hair loss.

questions.question: Will the hair loss come back after treatment?
questions.answer: With proper maintenance and follow-up care, results are long-lasting. However, ongoing treatment may be needed to maintain optimal results and prevent future loss.

questions.question: How many sessions will I need?
questions.answer: Typically, 6-8 sessions spaced 2-4 weeks apart are recommended initially, followed by maintenance sessions. Your treatment plan will be customized based on your specific needs.
